## Data Camp

This week please complete both the **Intermediate R**^[The Intermediate R module is a little heavy on the programming aspect so get an idea of what these functions do in general, but don't spend too much time on any of the problems.] and **Foundations of Inference**^[Foundations of Inference assumed you have had some introduction to statistics at some point in your past. If you have not, please check out the [Resources](https://edp611.theoreticalphysed.com/resource/r/#learning-r-1) page for some suggestions on statistical reviews.] courses on [Data Camp](https://www.datacamp.com/){target="_blank"}. The modules cover:

- Conditionals and Control Flow 
- Loops
- Functions
- The apply family 
- Utilities
<br>
and
<br>
- Introduction to ideas of inference 
- Completing a randomization test: gender discrimination  
- Hypothesis testing errors: opportunity cost 
- Confidence intervals
